meanings.definition: A type of bird with red patches on its wings.
meanings.sent1: The redwings chirped happily in the tree.
meanings.sent2: I spotted a flock of redwings flying overhead.
meanings.sent3: The redwings had a party in the birdhouse.
meanings.sent4: The redwings painted the sky with their vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: The redwings' wings glowed like fiery embers in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: The name of a professional ice hockey team based in Detroit.
meanings.sent1: My friend is a huge fan of the Redwings.
meanings.sent2: The Redwings won the championship last year.
meanings.sent3: The Redwings players celebrated their victory with a dance.
meanings.sent4: The Redwings soared to victory on the ice.
meanings.sent5: The Redwings' teamwork was as strong as their skates on the rink.

meanings.definition: A type of plant with red flowers.
meanings.sent1: The garden was filled with beautiful redwings.
meanings.sent2: I planted some redwings in my backyard.
meanings.sent3: The redwings in the garden whispered secrets to each other.
meanings.sent4: The redwings bloomed like little flames in the flower bed.
meanings.sent5: The redwings' petals danced in the breeze like flickering flames.
